fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Membership Growth 5 Years
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to calculate and visualize membership growth trends over multiple years with time-series analysis.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me how our membership has grown over the past 5 years with a line chart showing the trend by year. I'd like to click on any year to see the members who joined that year.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a line chart showing membership counts over 5 years
Years are properly grouped and displayed on x-axis
Chart includes proper labels and title
Response includes narrative interpretation of the growth trend
Chart supports drill-down to show member list for selected year
Member table allows opening individual member records
